activities: Hirease is a Consumer Reporting Agency as defined by the Fair Credit Reporting Act.  Hirease provides employment screening services to employers to assist them during the hiring process and making employment decisions.  Hirease obtains and collects personal data from consumers for the purpose of conducting the employment consumer report. The verifications and/or checks may include but are not limited to: driving records, workers compensation records (in compliance with the ADA or other applicable law), credit bureau files, employment references, personal references, any educational and licensing institution records, and any criminal records information.  Consumers consent to and authorize Hirease to conduct such searches.  Hirease is accredited by the National Association of Background Screeners.
